Message:
One day, Her Holiness called
me into the deepest part
of the cathedral.

There are two relics that have
existed since the beginning of
the Church of Longinus’s
2000-year history.

The Baptismal Fire that
was bestowed by God—
the “Lance of Longinus.”

The Divine Oak that
descended from Heaven—
the “Staff of Tikkun.”

These two sacred treasures—
said to awaken when the
world comes to an end—

were now in the hands
of Her Holiness.
“I am not long for this world.”

A black infestation begins
to spread throughout
Her Holiness’s body.

“Find the ‘Successor’ of the Staff.
The fate of the world is at stake.”

She held the Staff out to me,
but I couldn’t accept it.

After all, I couldn’t even
save my homeland,
so the idea of me
saving the world was...

As I stood there trembling,
Her Holiness gently
smiled at me.

“There is no need to worry.
I have absolute faith that
you can do it.”
